data.text: @Isaac20968118 @SizweLo I agree. But the cabal/deep state/shadow or secret govt time is almost up. It's just the last kick of a dying horse. I understand that the Messiah story is the last "false flag operation" in preparing humanity for their last plan, which is "alien invasion".

@Mah_phe_Fo @SizweLo Now, to avoid these known classified cosmic secrets about activities of UFOs in space & on the moon, they to stage some of the scenes since the launch & moon landing was televised live, with a few minutes delay, to the public. Therefore, the moon landing was real.

/End

@Mah_phe_Fo @SizweLo I just wanted to correct the "staged" moon landing statement. The US prepared a studio for a moon landing & had actors mimicking the real moon landing as it was taking place. They (USA) knew that we were not alone, & they were excepting to come across UFO.

@Mah_phe_Fo @SizweLo I agree that the Russia-Ukraine conflict is a "false flag operation". As for the coming of the Messiah, religious people have the free will to believe in whatever makes them sleep better at night. If you ask me, no one is coming to save us, unless it's malevolent aliens.
[Thread]

@SizweLo Jesus said,“See to it that no one deceives you.For many will come in My name,claiming,‘I am the Christ,’ and will deceive many. You will hear of wars and rumors of wars,but see to it that you are not alarmed.These things must happen, but the end is still to come.
Matt 24:4-6
@SizweLo Well, they staged an entire moon landing, and many other events! So it only makes sense that we'd have a staged reappearing of "the Messiah!" 😂😂😂
